text: 9|60|Chadakba kerala phakira, michakina arau chadakba adayara kamata niyukta karmacaraisakalara babe, arau yara antara (satyara prati) akrsta karaara arasyaka tara babe, dayamuktira babe, rnagrastasakalara babe, allahara pathara babe lagate muchaphirasakalara babe. E'ito allahara taraphara paraa nirdharaita. Arau allaha sarbajna, prajnamaya.
